## Question 1

```{r}
pi <- function(x) {
  3/2 * x^3 + 11/8 * x^2 + 1/6 * x + 1/12
}

n <- 1000

c <- 3/2 + 11/8 + 1/6 + 1/12
rn <- vector(mode = "numeric", length = n)
time <- 0
for (count in 0:n) {
  x <- runif(1)
  u <- runif(1)
  if (u < c * pi(x)) {
    count+1
    time <- time + 1
    rn[count] <- x
  } else {
    time <- time + 1
  }
}
```
